requestHeaderModifier.description: Headers to be modified in the request.

responseHeaderModifier.description: Headers to be modified in the response.

requestRedirect.description: Directly respond to the request with a redirect.

urlRewrite.description: Modify the URL path or authority.

requestMirror.description: Mirror incoming requests to another destination.

directResponse.description: Directly respond to the request with a static response.

cors.description: Handle CORS preflight requests and append configured CORS headers to applicable requests.

a2a.description: Mark this traffic as A2A to enable A2A processing and telemetry.

ai.description: Mark this as LLM traffic to enable LLM processing.

localRateLimit.description: Rate limit incoming requests. State is kept local.

remoteRateLimit.description: Rate limit incoming requests. State is managed by a remote server.

extAuthz.description: Authenticate incoming requests by calling an external authorization server.

timeout.description: Timeout requests that exceed the configured duration.
